review: I rarely leave negative reviews of hotels. When I book| I’m very budget conscious and therefore gauge my expectations appropriately. But being a Hilton Honors member| I’ve stayed in my far share of Hamptons and this one fell below par.
First the positives:

-The location is good. Not amazing but within about a mile of most major attractions. Coming from O’Hare| we took the blue line L train and got off at Clark/Lake and it was maybe a half mile walk to the hotel.
-All staff members we dealt with were very friendly.
-Room was clean. No complaints there.
Now what fell short for me:

-Noise during the night. There aren’t words to describe the ungodly noises from outside at 4 am to 7 am every night but one that we were there. Sounded like someone dropping a metal dumpster from a third story balcony repeatedly. We aren’t light sleepers and were both miserable.
-View. We had a view of a dirty alley. I always expect a crappy view when I book through a travel site if I don’t upgrade to a special room but this was definitely disappointing.
-Size. Again| travel site bookings are the bottom of the barrel for hotels and the Hampton stuffed us into a room that was smaller than any European room I’ve stayed in.
-False advertising. The online photo showed a shower door. Our room had a curtain. Not a big deal to some but I avoid germ-lined curtains intentionally.
I hate to say I wouldn’t recommend to anyone. Kind of the downer of our otherwise great trip.

review: 家族旅行(大人2人、中学生、小学生の4人)で利用。
ウィリスタワーやミレニアムパーク、シカゴ美術館等、ダウンタウンの観光地へのアクセスがとてもよかった。
ホテルの部屋はとても清潔で気持ちよかった。
装備品は必要最低限。
アメニティはシャンプーやせっけんはあるが・・・という感じ。
部屋の広さはダブルベッド2台の部屋だったが、広いという感じはない。
まあ観光から帰ってきて寝るだけの場所と考えれば、気にならないかと。
空調は効きすぎなので、一枚羽織るものを用意したほうが良いと思う。
name: Hampton Inn Chicago Downtown/N Loop/Michigan Ave

review: 6박을 했음
방 상태 - 어느날은 수건이 덜오고 어느날은 커피가 안채워져있고 어느날은 휴지통은 비워졌지만 옆에 머리카락들은 다 떨어져있고 어메니티가 덜 준비된 날도 있고 상태가 매일 다름

가서 엘리베이터 사용되도록 변경했음
